page.title: 19GARAGES IN KILNHURST
page.content: There are four garages in Kilnhurst. They are Sleights bus garage, Rotherham Bodywork (accident repairs and re-spray specialists), Thomas Street Motors (M.O.T.), all on Thomas Street, and the Kilnhurst Motor Co. The Kilnhurst Motor Co. sells petrol, repairs cars, and occasionally sells cars. It has a hydraulic jack and a ramp for raising cars, a brake tester, a headlamp tester, and a wheel setter. The men who repair damaged cars wear masks to protect them from the dust. There is a landrover to tow cars in, and it has a winch on the front of it and a folding yellow crane hidden in the back. There are four petrol pumps in the forecourt of the garage.
